text: James William Ambler (23 August 1887 – 8 August 1956) was an Australian rules footballer, who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Jim Ambler's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1887 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Jim Ambler
